text: Ana nehanage'na ana hoza mopa eri haviza ha'nena, ka'makoka fore hugahie. Ana hanugeno mago vahe'mo'e huno mopa rehakorige, krepi nofi'mofo azanku namanku'a rosegara nosanigeno, havi trazamo'ene ave've tra'zamo'a ana hozafina hageno marerigahie. Ana nehina hampomofona huntenugeno, ana hozafina kora ruontegahie.
